attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This orange morphed man is crazy and a terrible influence. To add onto this his app took 10 weeks to load onto my device! Like fix your app before you set it up onto the App Store. Not to mention after downloading this disturbing app I received a package in the mail and I opened it to find a BOX OF LIVE ROACHES CRAWLING INTO MY HOME. Like immediately after getting this app! Guys it’s not safe it hacks your phone and sets up a self destruction my phone almost BLEW UP, good thing I found time to contain it or I wouldn’t be able to help you guys! Don’t download this app this walking orange man will make sure you suffer if you do. Everyone leave one star I promise you won’t regret it.

attributes.title: this app killed my pet rat 😭 do NOT download!!!
attributes.review: When I first heard about this, I wanted to support my cheeto president so I downloaded it.🤒 BIG mistake. it took 3 weeks to download !! 🙄when I could finally opened it I was sitting next to my pet rat named george. george has tried to be supportive of bunker boy but when he witnessed the horrors from this app he dropped dead on the ground 😫😫😫!!!! it was filled w disturbing images of trump as a clown with knifes. very scary and i’m pretty sure it also downloaded many viruses onto my phone. no one should get this app, it’s the worst thing that could’ve ever happened to the internet. save yourself and ur pets before it’s too late !!! 😞

attributes.userName: c o r o n a a a a a
attributes.review:
As soon as I opened the app my eyes were invaded by an overly spray tanned 🍊orange 🍊man (I think a man at least🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️... I ran away from the app 🏃‍♀️ and kept running until I heard a dreadful ding🔔. I looked towards my phone, eyes still in pain from the previous incident, and I saw the cheeto puff man’s name on the screen 😱! I slowly started to melt as I ran down the street hoping for someone to see me and help, with my shoes sticking to the pavement with every step. As I slowed down and saw no one help me, my eyes started melting 🔘👄🔘. In my last moments of vision, I saw my legs and torso spread on the pavement with small bubbles on me as if I was boiling water💧, and then I passed away.
✖️👄✖️        xoxo, gossip girl💋

attributes.title: The worst app period
attributes.review: I thought this app would probably make me hate the person who I would never call my president less (no I didn’t) but guess what... nothing happened, in fact I feel like I hate him more. Not because of the app, I didn’t even open it, I don’t want to burn my eyes looking at the orange Cheeto you call your president, which I call an embarrassment to America which I don’t even like anymore because of him and his supporters. Additionally I honestly think the little bunker boy is too scared and stupid to do anything else instead of just hiding, standing in a 45° angle, not having the ability to speak, or drink water with one hand. PERIOD

attributes.title: do not recommend 😪😪
attributes.review: truly disappointed😥. i got the app and it asked for my phone number😳. sorry maam but i do not🤚🏽 feel comfortable giving my number to a cheeto😾.  it also took a good 5 seconds to load, good thing i was listening to music 🎶, really lets time pass by . Anyways , when i got the app everything was ight i guess until the next morning at around 6 am i woke up to my dead fish😰. now, im not saying that the app killed my fish or anything but that was the only inconsistency😔. rip mario😥. i was really looking forward to taking him on a walk but.. you know .. uh. in conclusion, dont get this app . might kill your pets too😔.

attributes.title: ✨ SCAM ✨
attributes.review: I got this 🍊 Trump 🍊 app too see everything trump had planned! I soon downloaded it after being wonderfully informed on the AMAZING app tik Tok !! It took almost a month to download and then suddenly every time I type the word tr0mp (regularly) it now shows up as 🍊!! And suddenly I have noticed that everywhere I went there was a sign of and orange everywhere!! I definitely do NOT recommend if you don’t want to ALSO see trump 2020 every time you close your eyes 🤮. This app hacked me and stole everything that I own ! 10/10 DONT recommend and think a better alternative which is way better and helps inform you is tik tok 🤩🤩🤩

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD❗️❗️❗️
attributes.review: This app almost cost me my house. After downloading it, which took over THREE DAYS, it took me to a screen with a KNOWN WHITE SUPREMACIST. I couldn't believe my eyes. After a bit of trying to scroll past and figure out what was going on, it glitched and jumped to a screen that told me I had 24 hours to go to a certain location near me and pay 4000 dollars or I would be sent to far far away to a Planet called Drool that's located just outside our Solar System. I paid up but that was almost all my rent. Luckily, my aunt Theresa is rich so she just bought me a house. I quickly deleted the app before anything further could happen.

attributes.title: THIS APP USES YOUR LOCATION!!!!!
attributes.review: This app is not safe at all! It wanted to use my location I don’t even know why! I just wanted to support my president but this is just toooo far. Why does he need my location? To find where I live and blackmail me if I vote against him in the election 😰? Not risking that! Please delete this app immediately if you have it and write a one star review to take it down. This app is dangerous and should not be on the App Store! Additionally it wanted my phone number! I thought I was going to receive a message from my president Donald John Trump himself but I was greeted by bots! This app is a scam. Please remove this dangerous app from the App Store at once.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: I WAS SO EXCITED TO DOWNLOAD THIS APP AND "SUPPORT" OUR ORANGE CHEETO LOOKING PRESIDENT🍊and turns out he had the audacity to run again, I later learned he was a rapist and is a racist and a homophobic and MANYYY more things. yeah so I no longer support him and tbh I never actually did! I OPENED THE APP I NEARLY SCREAMED CAUSE I think the app malfunctioned and used a picture of Donald duck instead, I nearly flew all the way into the great wall of China cause I was so scared. WHEN I came flying back to the U.S. I bounced off the white house and then a a basketball hit me in the head and I somehow was still intact when I came home! THE POINT IS WHEN U.OPEN THE APP, BAD things happen like what happened to me, so yeah don't get the app! With love, vedika 🧚‍♀️✨😻

attributes.title: I wish I could rate 0 stars
attributes.review: This app took 3 weeks to download but I was eager to start supporting our Cheeto of a “president”. Once I had downloaded it my entire room began to fill with his merchandise and boys with fishing pfp were in my dm’s. I ignored it and continued to use the app and soon after it started to collect my data like my house address and credit card information. I even got dms from the orange himself saying I should inject myself with cleaning products to get rid of the Coronavirus. He also killed my grandma when I was away from home. Overall I have to say the worst thing about this app is the ads I DON’T CARE IF YOU CAN’T REACH PINK LEVEL!
